description: Creates a new registration based on the RegistrationType field.

parameters.name: RegistrationType
parameters.description: The type of registration form to create. The list of RegistrationTypes can be found using the  DescribeRegistrationTypeDefinitions action.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: An array of tags (key and value pairs) to associate with the registration. (dict) --- The list of tags to be added to the specified topic. The key identifier, or name, of the tag. The string value associated with the key of the tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key identifier, or name, of the tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The string value associated with the key of the tag.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If you don't specify a client token, a randomly generated token is used for the request to ensure idempotency. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: RegistrationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the registration.

nested_items.name: RegistrationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the registration.

nested_items.name: RegistrationType
nested_items.description: The type of registration form to create. The list of RegistrationTypes can be found using the  DescribeRegistrationTypeDefinitions action.

nested_items.name: RegistrationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the registration.
CLOSED: The phone number or sender ID has been deleted and you must also delete the registration for the number.
CREATED: Your registration is created but not submitted.
COMPLETE: Your registration has been approved and your origination identity has been created.
DELETED: The registration has been deleted.
PROVISIONING: Your registration has been approved and your origination identity is being created.
REQUIRES_AUTHENTICATION: You need to complete email authentication.
REQUIRES_UPDATES: You must fix your registration and resubmit it.
REVIEWING: Your registration has been accepted and is being reviewed.
SUBMITTED: Your registration has been submitted and is awaiting review.

nested_items.name: CurrentVersionNumber
nested_items.description: The current version number of the registration.

nested_items.name: AdditionalAttributes
nested_items.description: Metadata about a given registration which is specific to that registration type.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: An array of tags (key and value pairs) to associate with the registration.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key identifier, or name, of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The string value associated with the key of the tag.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the registration was created, in UNIX epoch time format.
